# parameters

**Instance Property**

The parameters of the connection in which your protocol is running.

## Declaration

```swift
final var parameters: NWParameters? { get }
```

## Inspecting Instance Properties

- **remote**: The remote endpoint of the connection in which your protocol is running.
- **local**: The local endpoint of the connection in which your protocol is running.
